nodes.text: Arreis was a BFF-1 bulk freighter that transferred robo haulers to the Dellalt system, preparing for Operation Strike Fear. It was destroyed by Keyan Farlander and Hamo Blastwell during the defection of Bixby.
The name is an anagram of Sierra, LucasArts 'rival' computer game company, both struggling to prevail in the market of adventure games.
